Package warzone.service

Class CommonTool

java.lang.Object
warzone.service.CommonTool
public class CommonTool
extends java.lang.Object
This class is responsible to provide some basic tools to other classes.
Author:
Zexin, Ray

    • convertArray2String

      public static java.lang.String convertArray2String​(java.lang.String[] p_stringArray, java.lang.String p_separator, int from, int to)
      This method can generate String from a String array from a range and inserting separator into it.
      Parameters:
      p_stringArray - the array that should be converted
      p_separator - separator of the String
      from - the start of the array
      to - the end of the array
      Returns:
      the String generated from the array
